channel.title: Ku Klux Klan - Hate Website
channel.description:
Yes, the white supremist fucks have their own website called... www.KKK.bz ([url=http://www.kkk.com]KKK.com[/url] links to there) Very original. Check out the bottom of that page. [table] [tr] [td][img]http://www.kkk.bz/NA00682_1.gif[/img] God's Way - Kind after Kind - different cultures - A Beautiful Rainbow - And the Lord Said His Creation was GOOD![/td] [td]Love the Diversity of God's Creation Practice Racial Integrity Don't Race Mix Imagine the world with only one race - only one culture - Is that really what you want? ...Because that WILL be the End result Think about it![/td] [td][img]http://www.kkk.bz/index.1.gif[/img] [img]http://www.kkk.bz/index.2.gif[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table] They call themselves "The White Knights" and only believe that true white Christians are the only good people on the Earth and that they must eradicate anybody who isn't. These guys forget that Jesus was a Jew. Tell them that and they will kill you though. In order to intimidate Blacks, Browns, Jews, and many other types of people is by Cross Burning where they buy/make a 20 foot tall cross and stick it in your front lawn, throw some gasoline on it, and light it up. Then dance around five times and chant: I don't like people with bigger dicks than me. I don't like people with bigger dicks than me. I don't like people with bigger dicks than me. I don't like people with bigger dicks than me. I don't like people with bigger dicks than me. Okay so they don't say that lol, but you get the point why they don't like us. :D Anyways, the KKK.bz website has an order form to become a "White Knight" (AKA White jerk off) and you can send in your application if you have these requirements. [url=http://www.christianconcepts.net/informat.htm]The Official KKK Order Form[/url]
I am white and not of racially mixed descent. I am not married to a nonwhite. I do not date nonwhites no do I have nonwhite dependents. I believe in the ideals of Western Christian civilization and profess my belief in Jesus Christ as the Son of God. (None of my ancestors ever fucked anyone who wasn't white, especially when everyone was raping the Indians in USA in the 1700-1850s. I understand that The Knights Party is [b]legal and law abiding[/b] and that I will never be asked to commit an unlawful act. (*Cough* Bullshit) I understand that ( The Knights ) and ( The Knights Party) are one and the same and can be used interchangeably just as the GOP and the [b]Republican Party[/b] or The Grand Old Party and that these titles are the legal trademarks of The Knights Party,inc. and it's national director Pastor Thomas Robb (So the Republicans had ties to the KKK. The GRAND old party, eh?) I understand that I am not a representative of The Knights' Party I agree to follow the guidelines as set by headquarters to the best of my ability and to do what I am able to promote the interests of The Knights Party and its ultimate goal of political power and White Christian Revival. I understand that The Knights Party and its national director Pastor Thomas Robb has a trained staff at its national headquarters in Harrison, [b]AR[/b] which can help me find my potential as a Klansman or Klanswoman. They can answer my questions, help me and give me suggestions as I move up in rank. If I am interested in becoming a recruiter they will be there to assist me and instruct me in organizing my area. (Arizona... of course, the red neck capital of the USA right next to Texas and Loiusiana.) I understand I will be expected to be [b]honest, ethical, sacrificing, dedicated, disciplined, and loyal[/b]. (Oh wow... this totally means that you are expected to do EXACTLY what they say. That means, if they say go burn that cross on their lawn, you are expected to do it!)
I colored some parts (lol colored, the one thing kkk hates) of it to show interesting information. I wonder if I can join. I'll send my order form, get accepted, some into the meeting of all the white people in a white robe holding the confederate flag and then finally taking my hat off and saying that I hate spicks, spades, chinks, poloks, dotheads, and jews. No, I'm not rascist, that's just what they would expect to hear from a 'Klansman' though. This was also on the Dave Chapelle show, lol. Well if you don't like the website, maybe you will like their T-Shirts and other great things to buy from them! [url=http://www.christianbooksandthings.com/index1.htm]Christian Books and Things[/url] and [url=http://www.puttroopsontheborder.com/ozarkcraft.html]Ozark's Shit Statues[/url]. ~Ron ;D

item.title: Ku Klux Klan - Hate Website
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:7, topic:4339”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=5598.msg56626#msg56626 date=1151819454]
KKK should burn in Hell.
[/quote]
Yeah it really should. They have god’s philosophies all backwards. God taught to love everyone, not just the people with the same skin color.

Edit: If you’re looking for some laughs. I joined the chat and this is what happened.

KKK-Chat:

BARON8388: 14 ron
Ron: hello
BARON8388: 22nd where fredbear?
fredbear: blacksburg south carolina
fredbear: to far for me
BARON8388: ahhh ok
BARON8388: same here
BARON8388: st amant is your next?
fredbear: yes
fredbear: rally
Ron: are you guys meetin with each other?
fredbear: maybe
fredbear: who are you
Ron: can i come
BARON8388: lol
Ron: oh im ron
fredbear: ron edwards?
Ron: no no Ron Bhatia
BARON8388: what bout bok bbq fredbear
fredbear: some of our guys will go
BARON8388: hey ron edwards is my dads cousins name
Ron: cool
fredbear: the ones close
fredbear: that sounds arabic ron
Ron: no im not arabic
geschwader88 has joined.
Ron: dont ever say that
Ron: i hate arabs
BARON8388: whos ron edwards ive heard that name
Ron: and jews, and spicks, and spades. i would like to join your team
fredbear: iw of ika
BARON8388: ahhh ok
BARON8388: my dads cousins name is the same
BARON8388: from jersey
fredbear: explain your name it sounds galactic
Ron: my name?
fredbear: bhatia
fredbear: is it slavic
Ron: well it all started 22 years ago when suddenly my mom said that we need to change our sons name and last name when i was 5
Ron: they said it was because i looked brown to them, and i told them they were crazy
fredbear: thats odd
Ron: i am clearly white!
Ron: yes they are odd parents
fredbear: i think your full of shit
Ron: huh?
Ron: why is that
fredbear: i dunno
Ron: damit this is the 3rd blast kkk group who has said that to me! why!
Ron: i wanna join
fredbear: whoes the other 3
Ron: other 3 what?
fredbear: kkk groups
Ron: oh the kkk groups
Ron: ummm
Ron: www.kkk.bz and some other random websites
fredbear: hes a child molester
Ron: wow me too
fredbear: no not him
LWKExaltedCyclops: I have my console up fred
Ron: glad i didnt join his
Ron: well i how do i join then?
fredbear: oh i got a 20 page testimony on riccio
Ron: 20 pages! wonderful!
fredbear: he testified for the prosecuters in fort smith against david lane
Ron: smart guy, by the way, last time i looked i think i am brown.
[YOU HAVE BEEN EXPELLED FROM THE ROOM]

~Ron lol[/quote]

wow what morons, i ecpecialy hate them for 3 reasons, 1 they hate arabs, my parents are persian so its close, 2 they booted me cause i said im black and the bloodz and the cripz are coming to sh00t bullets up y’all niggas asses, 3rd they hate blacks and since i like the bloodz i wont stand for that and i made multiple account to bitch them off they really need to get lives, i really cant belive there are plp out here who r like that[br][size=1]Posted at: August 04, 2006, 06:04:51 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Ron, post:1, topic:4339”]Yes, the white supremist fucks have their own website called…

www.KKK.bz (KKK.com links to there)

Very original. Check out the bottom of that page.
[table]
[tr]
[td]
God’s Way - Kind after Kind - different cultures -
A Beautiful Rainbow - And the Lord Said His Creation was GOOD![/td]
[td]Love the Diversity of God’s Creation

Practice Racial Integrity

Don’t Race Mix

Imagine the world with only one race - only one culture - Is that really what you want?

…Because that WILL be the End result

Think about it![/td]
[td]
[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

They call themselves “The White Knights” and only believe that true white Christians are the only good people on the Earth and that they must eradicate anybody who isn’t. These guys forget that Jesus was a Jew. Tell them that and they will kill you though. In order to intimidate Blacks, Browns, Jews, and many other types of people is by Cross Burning where they buy/make a 20 foot tall cross and stick it in your front lawn, throw some gasoline on it, and light it up. Then dance around five times and chant:

I don’t like people with bigger dicks than me.
I don’t like people with bigger dicks than me.
I don’t like people with bigger dicks than me.
I don’t like people with bigger dicks than me.
I don’t like people with bigger dicks than me.

Okay so they don’t say that lol, but you get the point why they don’t like us.

Anyways, the KKK.bz website has an order form to become a “White Knight” (AKA White jerk off) and you can send in your application if you have these requirements. The Official KKK Order Form

I am white and not of racially mixed descent. I am not married to a nonwhite. I do not date nonwhites no do I have nonwhite dependents. I believe in the ideals of Western Christian civilization and profess my belief in Jesus Christ as the Son of God. (None of my ancestors ever fucked anyone who wasn’t white, especially when everyone was raping the Indians in USA in the 1700-1850s.

I understand that The Knights Party is legal and law abiding and that I will never be asked to commit an unlawful act. (Cough Bullshit)

I understand that ( The Knights ) and ( The Knights Party) are one and the same and can be used interchangeably just as the GOP and the Republican Party or The Grand Old Party and that these titles are the legal trademarks of The Knights Party,inc. and it’s national director Pastor Thomas Robb (So the Republicans had ties to the KKK. The GRAND old party, eh?)

I understand that I am not a representative of The Knights’ Party

I agree to follow the guidelines as set by headquarters to the best of my ability and to do what I am able to promote the interests of The Knights Party and its ultimate goal of political power and White Christian Revival.

I understand that The Knights Party and its national director Pastor Thomas Robb has a trained staff at its national headquarters in Harrison, AR which can help me find my potential as a Klansman or Klanswoman. They can answer my questions, help me and give me suggestions as I move up in rank. If I am interested in becoming a recruiter they will be there to assist me and instruct me in organizing my area. (Arizona… of course, the red neck capital of the USA right next to Texas and Loiusiana.)

I understand I will be expected to be honest, ethical, sacrificing, dedicated, disciplined, and loyal. (Oh wow… this totally means that you are expected to do EXACTLY what they say. That means, if they say go burn that cross on their lawn, you are expected to do it!)

I colored some parts (lol colored, the one thing kkk hates) of it to show interesting information.

I wonder if I can join. I’ll send my order form, get accepted, some into the meeting of all the white people in a white robe holding the confederate flag and then finally taking my hat off and saying that I hate spicks, spades, chinks, poloks, dotheads, and jews. No, I’m not rascist, that’s just what they would expect to hear from a ‘Klansman’ though. This was also on the Dave Chapelle show, lol.

Well if you don’t like the website, maybe you will like their T-Shirts and other great things to buy from them! Christian Books and Things and Ozark’s Shit Statues.

~Ron ;D[/quote]

did u know jesus was a jew
and then i said im a nigga and ima come fuck u up, what morons they cant face the fact that were right and better then them in ever way yet they find the nerve to ban us without a fair debate wow what bitches[br][size=1]Posted at: August 04, 2006, 06:26:41 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Greeny, post:46, topic:4339”]WTF!? rahowa: syria and egypt are gearing up to go against israel rahowa: russian bases all over are going haywire canadain_grand_dragon: hey does any one have hotmail rahowa: russia has said if usa lets israel attack with nukes rahowa: RUSSIA WILL JOOIN IN THE ATTACK AGAINST ISRAEL rahowa: join* rahowa: and in turn attack the united states D3V: and all of usa citizens will b drafted to fuel the effort rahowa: all this is happeneig right now WKRTX: J why was WW2 the war to end the white race wasn't most of the us white? oh I'm reading on David Lane like you said to do rahowa: usa is sending warships to vietnam as we speak JustinL: yes, read david lane rahowa: north korea is starting to mess with us too JustinL: thats where the holy 14 words came from rahowa: does anybody realize the enormity of what is happening right now??? JustinL: read about what he did rahowa: we could be looking at another world war rahowa: arabs armies are gearing up russian bases are going on alert america is sending military to asia Dr_Mengele: WW3 JustinL: nah, we dont have the recouses for another world war rahowa: and this is all because of israel rahowa: man havent you read stormy: ok, im confused, who is against who? rahowa: the land of gog and magog shall attack israel with iran and syria rahowa: so it has been written rahowa: and a major event has happened in europe canadain_grand_dragon has left. rahowa: some say this is the final secret of the fatama rahowa: the skys have been iluminated rahowa: and they say Gods wrath is upon us now stormy: isreal must release palistinian prisioner by tuesday rahowa: http://www.whatdoesitmean.com/index924.htm rahowa: that should take you to russian situation rahowa: http://www.whatdoesitmean.com/index923.htm JustinL: and this is where I disagree with CI, I think practicle and not of of Bible verses but Ill leave it at htat rahowa: that this fatama thing rahowa: well its more of a catholic thing rahowa: not ci stormy: rahowa...pure said that was an update rahowa: yes it is a update rahowa: all of it rahowa: Russia is really gearing up rahowa: we heightened our bases rahowa: now russia is rahowa: somthing big might happen rahowa: or as we speak rahowa: all strategic forces of russia are on high alert rahowa: this might be somthing israel is planning rahowa: we might have another sep 11 folks rahowa: the jews will do it to get us into a war with the islamic world again rahowa: Egypt said a war on all fronts is imminent rahowa: Syria said they will defend itself against israel JustinL: as they should cam: whats going on with WKRTX? ,That website should be destroyed, and anyone who was in the clan… Killed. Its racist. No, I am not black. But I severly hate people being racist. Its not if your black or white, you have the same mind, same soul. Its pathetic, “White knights” Pfft… Hand me a gun and il slaughter you all… Pathetic… Utter bullshit they speak off… Especially in this line:
I understand that The Knights Party is legal and law abiding and that I will never be asked to commit an unlawful act.
Well, its agianst the law to be racist… >.<;; Stupid faggots…

Hmm, I will correct myself here… “Hand me a gun”… Hand me any wepon. Hand me anything…

-Keanu
[/quote]
Hehe, you are just like one of them :).
They hate niggers, you hate racists. If you hate a racist, it means you are a racist yourself, if they hate a nigger, it means they are racists. Got it?

In my opinion everyone who hates the Ku Klux Klan is just as naive as they are.[/quote]

But how can you not hate people who have killed and punished others just beccause the color on their skin.

Read full topic
